title: Directs department of environmental conservation or its successor agency to establish management areas for newly acquired forest preserve lands
summary: Directs the department of environmental conservation, and any successor agency thereto, to establish a reasonable number of forest preserve management areas upon state lands, acquired on or after the effective date of this amendment to the constitution, which are made a part of the state forest preserve; authorizes the cutting, sale and removal of timber on such lands, and the use of motorized equipment for such purposes.
actClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing an amendment to section 1 of article 14 of the constitution, in relation to the management and use of the lands of the state forest preserve
